entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 1:49 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.9°C
Wind: ESE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries after midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
